summary: Feature request to add SAGA (Saga pattern) helpers to the TypeScript SDK for consistency with Java and PHP SDKs, which already include built-in SAGA implementations.
userImpact: Users implementing SAGA patterns would have access to helper utilities similar to those in Java and PHP SDKs, reducing boilerplate code.
proposedFix: Add SAGA helper utilities to the TypeScript SDK, similar to existing implementations in Java and PHP SDKs.
workaround: Implement SAGA pattern manually in user code or reference sample implementations.
resolutionDetails: Team decided not to implement built-in helpers, preferring to provide SAGA examples in samples instead. Will reconsider if demand increases.
keyQuote: Decided not to do this for now, we'll reopen if we see demand.
